data.system_settings: Google Chrome Version 68.0.3440.106, Firefox Quantum 61.0.2 - macOS Sierra 10.12.6
data.actual_result: It is partially out of the box or partially not visible, I found different behaviours in different browsers
data.short_description: When reacting with an emote such as Trademark, Copyright & Registered, they will appear very strange and displaced [Browser Only]
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord on a supported Browser - Send a message - React to it with one of the emotes: Trademark, Registered or Copyright - Observe how the reaction looks in the box
